scripts.migrate: export NO_D1_WARNING=true && wrangler d1 migrations apply DB
scripts.migrate-local: export NO_D1_WARNING=true && wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.sql-command: export NO_D1_WARNING=true && wrangler d1 execute DB --command
scripts.sql-command-local: export NO_D1_WARNING=true && wrangler d1 execute DB --local --command
